install.name: prettyBox
install.author: Joomla Bamboo
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2008 Joomla Bamboo. All rights reserved.
install.description: prettyBox is a flexible gallery in a module for Joomla. See the Joomla Bamboo Extensions page for more details. Please note that in order to use the lightbox effect you need to use this module in conjunction with our JB Library plugin.

param.name: id
param.label: Module ID
param.description: ID for this instance of the module.

param.name: directory
param.label: Image Directory
param.description: Directory images will be sourced from - this is the relative directory eg images/stories/.

param.name: output
param.label: Layout
param.description: The layout to display the category

param.name: items
param.label: Image Naming Convention
param.description: Select the convention you have used to name your images. Even if you select no details the title and desicription will be output in the source of your page for a better SEO result. Please ensure to use the same convention for each image name in order to have the module function properly.

param.name: link
param.label: Link Behaviour
param.description: Choose the action that occurs when an image is clicked. See the demo site for instrtuctions related to the content item and blog category options.
param.option: Opens image in the same window
Opens the image in a new window

param.name: right_margin
param.label: Right Margin
param.description: Enter the right margin for the images. This value creates a space to the right of each image in the gallery. Set to 0 to have no margin.

param.name: prettyPhoto
param.label: Enable prettyphoto?
param.description: Enable this option if you want to display image when clicked in a pretyyPhoto overlay. If you are using another module that includes prettyPhoto then set this option to no.

param.name: theme
param.label: Overlay Theme
param.description: Select the theme to use in the lightbox.

param.name: opacity
param.label: Overlay opacity
param.description: Set the opacity of the overlay - 1 is opaque and 0 is transparent.

param.name: padding
param.label: prettyPhoto padding
param.description: The width of the padding around the prettyPhoto overlay without px.

param.name: resize
param.label: Resize Image?
param.description: Set this option to true if you want to be able to resize large images that are automatically scaled down to fit within the browser window.

param.name: prettyBoxTitle
param.label: Show image title?
param.description: Display the title of the image in the overlay?

param.name: prettyBoxSpeed
param.label: Overlay Speed
param.description: The speed at which the overlay appears when the image is displayed in the lightbox.

param.name: img_width
param.label: Image Width
param.description: The width that the image is cropped to. No need to use px just the pixel value.

param.name: img_height
param.label: Image Height
param.description: The height that the image is cropped to. No need to use px just the pixel value.

param.name: crop_width
param.label: Crop ratio width
param.description: The width ratio that the image is cropped by

param.name: crop_height
param.label: Crop ratio height
param.description: The height ratio that the image is cropped by

param.name: height
param.label: Image block height
param.description: The height of each image block which includes the title, image and details.
